newsitem.title: USA: USDA adds $5 mln in rice to Philippine PL480 pact.
newsitem.headline: USDA adds $5 mln in rice to Philippine PL480 pact.

text.p: The U.S. Agriculture Department Friday said it amended a PL 480, Title I sales pact with the Philippines to provide for the sale of $5 million worth of U.S. rice.
USDA said the move boosts the Philippines' current Title I program to $15 million.
The supply period is fiscal year 1996.
Title 1, also know as the Food for Peace program, is a loan program for the purchase of U.S. farm goods with low interest rates and long-term payback periods.
